Purpose: To measure Stachybotrys chartarum/atra-specific IgE levels in patient specimens for accurate, reliable, and timely assessment of allergic sensitization.
Container: Properly labeled serum or heparinized/EDTA plasma tube
Equipment: Stachybotrys chartarum/atra IgE ELISA kit, microplate reader (~450 nm), plate washer, pipettes, incubator
